# awesome-toggle



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                           | Type                     | Default      |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------ | ------------ |
| `checked`  | `checked`  | If `true`, the toggle is checked. Default to `false`; | `boolean`                | `false`      |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | The flag of disabling the toggle. Default to `false`. | `boolean`                | `false`      |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | Variant of the toogle. Default to `checkbox`.         | `"checkbox" \| "switch"` | `'checkbox'` |


## Events

| Event           | Description                    | Type                                                    |
| --------------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| `awesomeChange` | Event of status being changed. | `CustomEvent<{ checked: boolean; innerEvent: Event; }>` |


## Shadow Parts

| Part          | Description |
| ------------- | ----------- |
| `"container"` |             |
| `"toggle"`    |             |
